tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Tooth Coloured Fillings,Paedodontics,
review:
** ** **** **** ******* ** *** **** *** *** **** ** ****** His approach to dental issues is vary novel, he provide you full visibility of the treatment required and never tried to over do the treatment. I am regularly visiting him since three years for tooth feeling and he also extracted one of my wisdom tooth. Recently I visited him with my 8 year old daughter for root canal and capping of some teeth, I must say that I was too afraid of the dental treatment for my daughter but Dr. Ravi made it too easy for me. My daughter did not had any tear and now also no fear of dentist :-)
I will give this guy a 5 star for the treatment he has done to me and my daughter.  

Thanks Dr. Ravi!!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Today i.e on 1st April I booked an appointment with Dr. Ravi Gurram for my mother pertaining to her dental issues, based on the reviews posted on Practo.com. And let me tell that, I completely agree with the reviews .

Dr.Ravi was extraordinarily humble and caring while diagnosing my mother. Dr.Ravi thoroughly checked the previous medical records and advised the apt treatment to avoid future complications.

I definitely..... definitely.... Recommend Dr.Ravi for his humanly approach towards patients.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
The treatment was very patiently friendly and these  was very very less pain while the RCT was being done. Post the RCT and filling of roots, I was provided with a temporary Cap since I was travelling for a week. Dr Ravi took care of it by providing a temporary Plastic Cap for a weak so that the filling doesn't come out and the tooth gets de-shaped. The Permanent cap was fixed later once I was back to the city and Dr Ravi made sure that he  fixes the Cap very perfectly until the cap take the proper shape of the tooth.
I'm very much satisfied. Thanks for the treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,
review: We are confident in the doctor’s hands and the doctors he refers in his clinic. The care and concern make the treatment personal. We wish him all the best.

review: Dr Ravi's approach towards treating patients is very unique. I went to him to check my mother's dental issues and throughout the treatment he made us feel at home. He understood the problem well and advised us what is best for her considering her medical history and current condition. He has taken very good care during the procedure to feel the patient comfortable. I found Pranaam Dental care is very good hospital for dental anomalies and is very cost effective.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I got my deep Gingival scalling done here and liked it very much. **** ** *** **** ****** ****** **** **** ** ** **** Doctor Ravi Gurram is very professional and one of the gentlest hands which made me not scared to go the dentist. He is very responsive to dental emergencies. Everything is explained in clear terms. Nothing is pushed on you or rushed by you. I'm happy of my treatment at Pranaam Dental Care. I highly recommend this clinic especially if you want your teeth taken care of the right way. I felt right at home and they did everything to make me comfortable and happy. Thanks to Doctor Ravi Gurram.
